    • appSave

      public void appSave()
      Saves a new appointment to the database using the appointment fields and an autogenerated appointment_ID from the database. Updates the table views with the new appointment.

    • appDelete

      public void appDelete()
      Deletes the selected appointment from the database. Updates the table views with the new appointment.

    • appUpdate

      public void appUpdate()
      Updates the selected appointment in the database with the appointment fields. Updates the table views with the new appointment.
